name: GWS - Streamlined
description:
Focus GWS on the COMIC! Navigation is green and white simply because I was too lazy to re-create and host an alternative image for the navigation that will work. Anybody else who wishes to try is welcome, just write a comment and tell me where I can find the (I hope identically sized) alternative image. But navigation is all you need! That and the comic. Which is what this gives you.

I personally don't like GirlsWithSlingshots that much, but my girlfriend does, so this is for you, my love.
